name: Disturbance in Waverun City
result_desc: No settlement required

name: Prologue of New Life
result_desc:
You have journeyed from the storm's heart,
befriending souls anew. In Convallaria's embrace,
beauty unfolds before you.
Every chapter before this was but a prelude.
|Now, fate's quill is placed within your hands.
The unwritten destiny of Iria beckons—
it is yours to craft.

name: Place of Blooming Convallaria
result_desc:
Swept up by fate, I find myself in a seemingly pleasant place to live…
And unexpectedly, I became the Leader of the Sword of Convallaria.
What destiny lies ahead for me?

name: All by Oneself
result_desc:
I too also have wondered if the Sword of Convallaria
could hold its own amid the chaos...
But it was Gloria and her knights 
who saved the town from the darkness at a crucial moment.
|Regardless of their intentions, at least for the moment,
they are the only ally we can rely on.

name: Castle and Knights
result_desc:
I don't know if I've made the right choice. 
Perhaps the only thing I can do is to follow the path,
win the upcoming battle, and strengthen 
the Sword of Convallaria even further.

name: Bloody Truth
result_desc:
Losing Rawiyah has left my companions in a state of disbelief and anguish…
I am no exception, but as the leader, I must shoulder my responsibilities.
With the increasingly tense situation and everyone counting on me,
I will continue to lead everyone forward…

name: Unintentional Conspiracy
result_desc:
The truth of Waverun City is clear.
To this very day, fulfilling Prince Lutfi's long cherished wish
and restoring peace to Iria remains an immutable goal.
But why do I falter in indecision?

name: Resolutions and the Past
result_desc:
The situation is volatile, but fortunately,
we won the second battle of Crossroads Keep.
Although the path ahead remains uncertain,
I believe that peace is on the horizon.

name: Future in Mist
result_desc: None

name: Future in Mist
result_desc: None

name: Unintentional Conspiracy
result_desc:
The truth was unexpected, and Prince Lutfi wasn't off the hook…
But at least, Gloria is trustworthy…
Anyway, we can't afford to lose the second battle of Crossroads Keep…

name: Price of Justice
result_desc:
We suffered heavy losses at Crossroads Battle II.
This may be inevitable for us, but the path to peace
has always been forged by blood-soaked warriors.
However, will it come to a good end?

name: All by Oneself
result_desc:
I had wondered if the Sword of Convallaria could hold out on its own…
But it was Safiyyah and the Hanged Men who saved the town
from the darkness at this crucial juncture.
|Despite our displeasure with the actions of the King's Army of Iria, 
as Irians, the King's Army is the only ally on which we can rely.

name: Remaining Smoke of Gunpowder
result_desc:
The Sword of Convallaria proved its strength by winning the battle.
Of course, this is only the beginning.
The Union will not give up just like that,
and we will keep fighting as well.

name: Closely Linked Destinies
result_desc:
The second battle of Crossroads Keep is imminent.
This is our most crucial battle yet, and I will lead my men to victory,
and lay a foundation of peace for Iria.

name: Pain is the Price of Victory
result_desc:
I thought winning the battle would grant us happiness…
However, the cost was too steep, after losing many of our allies and friends…
Is this the price of peace?

name: Long Night
result_desc: None

name: Long Night
result_desc: None

name: Temporary Calm
result_desc: None

name: All by Oneself
result_desc:
I have wondered if the Sword of Convallaria could stand alone…
Just in time, it was Samantha, Judge of the Light of Sanctuary,
who dispelled the darkness and shielded the town.
|Even though the intentions of the Papal States of Rodinia are uncertain,
they are a powerful ally against the Darklight.

name: All by Oneself
result_desc:
I often wondered if the Sword of Convallaria could remain neutral,
but reality demonstrates that no one can stand alone in this turmoil…

name: Fall of the Darklight
result_desc:
We have finally defeated the Darklight and freed the Mine Pit.
Yet the cost of victory was too great.
It's time for this terrible war to come to an end…

name: Execute the Trial for Peace
result_desc:
To bring an end to the war in Iria,
we embarked on a path that was paved with blood.
Does the end of this path lead to the peace we seek?

name: Gradually Receding Peace
result_desc:
This was the closest we've ever come to achieving peace, 
so why has it come to this?
Somehow, peace keeps evading our grasp…

name: Why We are Fighting
result_desc:
For peace, we soil our hands over and over again,
watching people fall into the pool of blood one after another.
Samantha is heartbroken, and I have to be with her until the end…

name: Truth and Determination
result_desc:
What the Papal States has done is unforgivable,
but fortunately, it is not too late.
It's time to unite and fight for real peace!

name: But This Is the Only Thing I Can Do
Bustling Shadows
result_desc:
The Convallaria Trading Post is steadily finding its path,
and your journey into trade has officially begun.

name: Rising to Fame
result_desc:
It is unclear if the Convallaria Festival was a success or not,
but you made a good effort.
Perhaps maintaining that momentum is all that matters.

name: Wheels Rolling On
result_desc:
On this harsh road, you have gained more companions.
Having won them over, they handed the reins of the wagon to you.

name: Trading
result_desc: Trading, nonstop trading…

name: Ring-a-Ding-Ding
result_desc: None

result_desc: None

name: A Fine Night on the Wilds
result_desc: None
